com.basho.riak.client.core.netty

Class StoreValueHealthCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.ByteToMessageDecoder
          • com.basho.riak.client.core.netty.HealthCheckDecoder
            • com.basho.riak.client.core.netty.StoreValueHealthCheck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HealthCheckFactory, io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class StoreValueHealthCheck
extends HealthCheckDecoder
implements HealthCheckFactory
    A health check that attempts to store a value in Riak.

    Important note when using this HealthCheckDecoder:

    If security is enabled in Riak, the user the client is configured for must have access rights to the supplied location.

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Brian Roach
